attributes.action: reject the fluoridation of our drinking water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fluoride is a poison whose effects on DNA, the regeneration of cells, cancer growth and many other natural processes in the human body are beginning to cause alarm among researchers. The blanket use of fluoride to treat small pockets of dental decay risks harming a far wider population. People with poor dental health regimes should be encouraged to take more care; those with good regimes should not be forced to take potentially harmful medicine because of others' lack of care.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
